sentences.sContent: I have already spoken about the dialectical materialist view of motive and effect.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have already spoken about the dialectical materialist view of motive and effect.
sentences.sCn: 关于动机和效果的辩证唯物主义观点，我在前面已经讲过了。

sentences.sContent: It is also maintained that the methodology should be focussed on the reliability of the materials interpreted with dialectical materialist ic point of view.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is also maintained that the methodology should be focussed on the reliability of the materials interpreted with dialectical materialist ic point of view.
sentences.sCn: 本文认为此项研究还必须注意工作方法，即注意使用资料的可靠程度与坚持辩证唯物主义的观点。

sentences.sContent: Marxs totality philosophy is materialist concrete totality based on reforming Hegel s totality philosophy and is typical of having strong critical power against capitalism.
sentences.sContent_eng: Marxs totality philosophy is materialist concrete totality based on reforming Hegel s totality philosophy and is typical of having strong critical power against capitalism.
sentences.sCn: 马克思的总体性哲学是在改造黑格尔概念总体性的基础上提出的唯物主义的具有对资本主义强大批判力的具体总体性。

words.tran: 重要的；物质的，实质性的；肉体的
唯物主义；唯物论；物质主义
使具体化，使有形；使突然出现；使重物质而轻精神
